    {"name": "route_ddd", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null},
    {"name": "route_bit", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null},
    {"name": "dddvet", "type": ["null", "float"], "default": null},
    {"name": "dcdvet", "type": ["null", "float"], "default": null},
    {"name": "unit", "type": ["null", "string"], "default": null},
    {"name": "conv_factor", "type": ["null", "float"], "default": null},

  ]
}

properties.SQL select query:
select
	id,
	comp,
	species_bit,
	status,
	atcvet,
	sa_order,
	sa_sporsms,
	sa_desc,
	antimicro_class,
	route_ddd,
	route_bit,
	dddvet,
	dcdvet,
	unit,
	conv_factor,
	combi,
	acting,
	obs
from
	pemv.subs_ddd_dcd
WHERE
	(species_bit & '${species_bit}'::bit(23))::int <> 0  AND (route_bit & '${route_bit}'::bit(7))::int <> 0
order by
	comp asc,
	id asc,
	status asc,
	species_bit asc,
	route_bit asc,
	acting asc

processGroups.name: Copy of Copy of Copy of Join

properties.SQL:
SELECT original.*, enrichment.* 
FROM original 
LEFT OUTER JOIN enrichment 
ON original.id = enrichment.id

properties.SQL select query:
SELECT 
    us_cum,
    animal_status,
    species_bit,
    id,
    cum,
    atc_code,
    aim_code,
    official_id,
    shortdesc,
    presentation,
    ab,
    pm,
    species,
    uom_categ,
    uom_categ_id,
    measure_tot,
    measure_tot_un,
    sa_sporsms,
    sa_desc,
    sa_dose,
    sa_dose_un,
    measure_unit,
    measure_unit_un,
    sa_princ,  
    route_bit,
    acting,
    active, 
    updated,
    tags,
    num_subs
FROM 
    pemv.vm_product_subs
WHERE
	NOT (species_bit & '${species_bit}'::bit(23))::int = 0 
	AND (route_bit & '${route_bit}'::bit(7))::int = 0
ORDER BY 
    num_subs DESC, 
    us_cum ASC, 
    animal_status ASC, 
    species_bit ASC

SELECT 
    us_cum,
    animal_status,
    species_bit,
    id,
    cum,
    atc_code,
    aim_code,
    official_id,
    shortdesc,
    presentation,
    ab,
    pm,
    species,
    uom_categ,
    uom_categ_id,
    measure_tot,
    measure_tot_un,
    sa_sporsms,
    sa_desc,
    sa_dose,
    sa_dose_un,
    measure_unit,
    measure_unit_un,
    sa_princ,  
    route_bit,
    acting,
    active, 
    updated,
    tags,
    num_subs
FROM 
    pemv.vm_product_subs
WHERE
	NOT ((route_bit & '${route_bit}'::bit(7))::int <> 0) 
	AND (species_bit & '${species_bit}'::bit(23))::int <> 0 
ORDER BY 
    num_subs DESC, 
    us_cum ASC, 
    animal_status ASC, 
    species_bit ASC

SELECT 
    us_cum,

FROM 
    pemv.vm_product_subs
WHERE
	(species_bit & '${species_bit}'::bit(23))::int <> 0 AND (route_bit & '${route_bit}'::bit(7))::int <> 0
ORDER BY 
    num_subs DESC, 
    us_cum ASC, 
    animal_status ASC, 
    species_bit ASC

    us_cum,

    species_bit,
    id,
    cum,
    atc_code,
    aim_code,
    official_id,
    shortdesc,
    presentation,

    uom_categ_id,
    measure_tot,

    sa_sporsms,

WHERE
	NOT (species_bit & '${species_bit}'::bit(23))::int <> 0 
	AND (route_bit & '${route_bit}'::bit(7))::int = 0
ORDER BY
